title: You Should Pity Us Instead
description: A debut collection of short stories which sympathetically explores some of the toughest dilemmas we face in our struggle though life.You Should Pity Us Instead explores some of our toughest dilemmas: the cost of Middle East strife at its most intimate level, the likelihood of God considered in day-to-day terms, the moral stakes of family obligations, and the inescapable fact of mortality. Amy Gustine exhibits an extraordinary generosity toward her characters, instilling them with a thriving, vivid presence.
author: Amy Gustine
